login.title: Log in to Parket
login.provideBothFields: Please provide both email and password

forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
forgotPassword.checkEmail: Please check your email for password reset instructions
forgotPassword.failed: Failed to send reset instructions. Please try again.

activeParking.title: Active Parking
activeParking.noActiveParking: You don't have any active parking sessions

favorites.title: Favorite Locations
favorites.noFavorites: You haven't saved any parking locations yet

chat.welcome: Hello! How can we help you today?
chat.autoResponse: Thanks for your message. One of our support agents will respond shortly.
chat.permissionMessage: We need permission to access your photos to send images.
chat.imageReceived: Thanks for sending the image. Our support team will review it.
chat.imageError: There was an error selecting the image. Please try again.
chat.askTransaction: Is this about a current or past parking transaction?
chat.selectTransaction: Please select the transaction you need help with:
chat.selectTopic: What topic best describes your issue?
chat.describeIssue: Please describe your issue in detail and our support team will assist you shortly.
chat.agentResponse: Thank you for providing the details. One of our support agents will contact you in a moment.
chat.title: Support Chat
chat.endChatMessage: Are you sure you want to end this chat session?
chat.rateDescription: How was your chat experience with our support team?

howToPark.question: How do I start parking?
howToPark.answer: Simply open the app, select 'Find Parking', and follow the on-screen instructions to find and book a parking spot.

payment.question: What payment methods are accepted?
payment.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards.

cancel.question: How do I end a parking session?
cancel.answer: Just go to the parking lot and exit. The system will automatically calculate the cost and charge your payment method. It is that easy!

refund.question: How do refunds work?
refund.answer: Refunds are automatically processed to your original payment method within 3-5 business days of cancellation.

autopay.title: Automatic Top-up
autopay.topupWhen: Top up my wallet when balance falls below:
autopay.description: Your wallet will be automatically topped up using your default payment method when your balance falls below the selected amount.
autopay.currentSetting: Your wallet will be automatically topped up with {{amount}} when the balance falls below {{threshold}}.
autopay.disclaimer: Auto top-up is disabled. When your license plate is entered into our system, a provisional charge of {{amount}} TRY will be withdrawn from your account to your default card. When you exit the parking lot, your balance will be recalculated according to the actual amount. If your payment is higher than needed, the difference will be refunded to your wallet. If your payment is less than needed, the new amount will be charged from your card. In order not to have problems when exiting, make sure you add a reliable card with balance or open auto top-up.

addCard.title: Add New Card
addCard.otpDescription: We've sent a verification code to your registered phone number

masterpass.title: Masterpass
masterpass.otpDescription: Please enter the verification code sent to your phone number registered with Masterpass

addCard.successMessage: Your card has been successfully added to your payment methods

topup.title: Top Up Wallet
topup.successMessage: Your wallet has been successfully topped up with {{amount}}

cardDetails.title: Card Details
cardDetails.removeMessage: Are you sure you want to remove this card? This action cannot be undone.
cardDetails.info: This card will be used for all your future payments unless you select a different payment method.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.parkingDesc: Receive notifications for parking availability and updates
notifications.paymentDesc: Receive notifications for payment status and updates
notifications.promotionsDesc: Receive notifications for promotions and offers
notifications.systemDesc: Receive notifications for system updates and announcements

communications.callDesc: Allow us to contact you via phone calls for important updates
communications.smsDesc: Receive SMS notifications about your parking and payments
communications.emailDesc: Get email updates about your account and parking history
communications.pushDesc: Receive instant updates directly on your device

navigation.headToStairs: Head to the stairs to reach floor {{floor}}
navigation.headToDestination: Head to your destination on floor {{floor}}

campaigns.title: Campaigns
campaigns.termsDescription: This offer is subject to availability and cannot be combined with other promotions. The discount will be automatically applied to eligible transactions during the campaign period.
campaigns.noCampaigns: No active campaigns at the moment

about.description: Parket is Turkey's leading smart parking platform, making parking easier and more efficient for drivers across the country. Our mission is to transform the parking experience through innovative technology.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.locationTrackingDesc: Allow app to track your location for finding nearby parking spots
privacy.biometricDesc: Use Face ID or Touch ID to secure your account
privacy.parkingHistoryDesc: Keep record of your parking history and preferences
privacy.shareDataDesc: Help us improve by sharing anonymous usage data
privacy.analyticsDesc: Allow collection of app analytics to improve service
